00002 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>

00004 #define LightSensorAddress  0b01110010 // 0x39
00005 #define MAXLUX 1846 // standard mode max
00006 
00007 // Table for channel ratio (i.e. channel1 / channel0)
00008 static unsigned char ratioLut[129] PROGMEM = {
00009 100,100,100,100,100,100,100,100,
00010 100,100,100,100,100,100,99,99,
00011 99,99,99,99,99,99,99,99,

00023 33,33,32,32,32,32,32,31,
00024 31,31,31,31,30,30,30,30,
00025 30};

00027 // Table to convert channel values to counts
00028 static unsigned short countLut[128] PROGMEM = {
00029 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7,
00030 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15,
00031 16, 18, 20, 22, 24, 26, 28, 30,
00032 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42, 44, 46,

00046 void sleepModeLight(void){
00047     I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00048     I2C_WRITE(0x00);            // Power-down state
00049 return ;
00050 }
00051 
00052 unsigned char WakeUpModeLight(void){
00053         unsigned char ret = -1;
00054         unsigned char count = 0;
00055 
00056         do {
00057         ret = I2C_START(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG); 
00058 
00059         if(ret == 0){
00060 
00061         I2C_WRITE(0x03); 
00062 
00063         I2C_REP_START(LightSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);
00064         ret = I2C_READ_ACK();
00065         }
00066 
00067         if(count++ > 10) 
00068             return 1;
00069 
00070         } while(ret != 0x03);                   // While Response of command WakeUp is not 0x03
00071 
00072 return 0;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void setExtendedMode(void){
00076         I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00077         I2C_WRITE(0x1D);                        // Extended range mode
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 void ResetToStandardMode(void){
00082         I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00083         I2C_WRITE(0x18);                        // Extended range mode
00084 }
00085 
00086 unsigned char readAdc0(void){
00087         unsigned char readValue = 0;
00088 
00089         I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00090         I2C_WRITE(0x43);
00091 
00092         I2C_REP_START(LightSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);
00093         readValue = I2C_READ_ACK(); 
00094 
00095 return readValue;
00096 }

00099 unsigned char readAdc1(void){
00100         unsigned char readValue = 0;
00101 
00102         I2C_START_WAIT(LightSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00103         I2C_WRITE(0x83);
00104 
00105         I2C_REP_START(LightSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);
00106         readValue = I2C_READ_ACK(); 
00107 
00108 return readValue;
00109 }
00110 
00111 // simplified lux equation approximation using tables
00112 unsigned short calculateLux(unsigned char channel0, unsigned char channel1)
00113 {
00114         unsigned long lux = 0;
00115         // lookup count from channel value
00116         unsigned short count0 = pgm_read_byte_near(countLut[channel0&0b01111111]);
00117         unsigned short count1 = pgm_read_byte_near(countLut[channel1&0b01111111]);
00118 
00119         // calculate ratio
00120         unsigned char ratio = 128; // default
00121 
00122         // avoid division by zero - count1 cannot be greater than count0
00123         if((count0) && (count1 <= count0))
00124                 ratio = ((count1 * 128) / count0);
00125 
00126         // calculate lux
00127         lux = (((count0-count1) * pgm_read_byte_near(ratioLut[ratio]))  / 256);
00128 
00129         // if lux is over MAXLUX, put MAXLUX as maximum
00130         if(lux > MAXLUX)
00131                 lux = MAXLUX;
00132 
00133 return ((unsigned short) lux);
00134 }
00135 
00136 int getLight(void){
00137         int light=0;
00138         unsigned char temp, adc0, adc1;
00139 
00140         /* Wait Data Light available */
00141         if(WakeUpModeLight() == 1) {
00142                 return -1;
00143         }
00144 
00145     setExtendedMode();
00146     do{
00147         adc0 = readAdc0(); 
00148     adc1 = readAdc1(); 
00149     }
00150     while(! (adc0 & 128 && adc1 & 128));
00151     light = calculateLux(adc0,adc1);
00152 
00153     sleepModeLight();
00154     I2C_STOP();
00155 
00156 return light;
00157 }

00160 /*****************************************************************************/

00162 #define TemperatureSensorAddress  0b10010010       
00163 
00164 int sleepMode(void){
00165         unsigned char ret = -1;
00166         ret = I2C_START(TemperatureSensorAddress);  
00167 
00168         if(ret != 0)
00169                 return ret;
00170 
00171         I2C_WRITE(0x01);                        // write on confiuration register
00172         I2C_WRITE(0xC0);                        // Put SuhtDown mode, start one shot convertion
00173         I2C_STOP();
00174 
00175 return 0;
00176 }
00177 
00178 int WakeUpMode(void){
00179         unsigned char ret = -1;
00180         ret = I2C_START(TemperatureSensorAddress);  
00181 
00182         if(ret != 0)
00183                 return ret;
00184 
00185         I2C_WRITE(0x01);                        // CONTROLS/STATUS REGISTER 
00186         I2C_WRITE(0x40);            //WakeUP
00187         I2C_STOP();
00188 
00189 return 0;
00190 }
00191 
00192 int configureTemperature(void){
00193         int t;
00194         I2C_INIT();
00195 
00196         t=I2C_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);
00197         if(t!=0)
00198                 return t;
00199 
00200         I2C_WRITE(0x04);                        // CONTROLS/STATUS REGISTER 
00201         I2C_WRITE(0xE0);                        // 14bits resolution & Timeout Off0xE0
00202         
00203         I2C_WRITE(0x01);                        // CONTROLS/STATUS REGISTER 
00204         I2C_WRITE(0x40);                        
00205 
00206         I2C_STOP();
00207 return 0;
00208 }
00209 
00210 int getTemperature(void){
00211         int temperature=0;
00212         unsigned char temp;
00213 
00214         WakeUpMode();
00215 
00216         /* Wait data temperature available */
00217         do {
00218         I2C_START_WAIT(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);  
00219 
00220         I2C_WRITE(0x04);                        // CONTROLS/STATUS REGISTER 
00221         I2C_REP_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);  // Send a responce request
00222         temp = I2C_READ_NACK();                 // Read the response
00223 
00224         I2C_STOP();
00225         }
00226         while(!(temp & 0x01));                  // While Data Available Flag is not set
00227 
00228         /* Read the TEMPERATURE DATA REGISTER */
00229         I2C_START_WAIT(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_WRITE_FLAG);  
00230 
00231         I2C_WRITE(0x00);                        // Write the temperature data register 0x00
00232         I2C_REP_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);       // Send a responce request
00233         temperature = I2C_READ_NACK()<<8;            // Read the response
00234         
00235         I2C_WRITE(0x10);                        // Write the temperature hight byte data register 0x00
00236         I2C_REP_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);       // Send a responce request
00237         temperature = I2C_READ_NACK()<<8;            // Read the response
00238         
00239         I2C_WRITE(0x11);                        // Write the temperature low byte data register 0x00
00240         I2C_REP_START(TemperatureSensorAddress+I2C_READ_FLAG);       // Send a responce request
00241         temperature |= I2C_READ_NACK();            // Read the response
00242 
00243         I2C_STOP();
00244 
00245         /* Go to sleep mode */
00246         sleepMode();
00247 
00248 return temperature/128;
00249 }
